tool_description: The most popular Lunapic.com art filters are now available via API.  A full list of over 100 supported art effects are listed here http://lunapic.com/?filters
name: LunaPic Photo Effects
title: LunaPic Photo Effects

api_list.name: /v2/api-call.php

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of image to process.  Note: max size is 1500x1500 pix.

required_parameters.name: filter
required_parameters.description: Which LunaPic image filter to use.  Full list of filters at http://lunapic.com/?filters
